summary: Frontend-only portfolio website testing completed successfully. All 5 pages (Home, Portfolio, About, Contact, Case Study) are rendering correctly with proper navigation, images, and content. No critical issues found.

issues: Missing data-testid attributes on interactive elements (buttons, links, form inputs) - recommended for future test automation
External 404 errors from Microsoft Office Online iframe fonts (segoeui.woff/ttf) - not controllable, external resource issue
Cabinet Grotesk font request blocked (ERR_BLOCKED_BY_ORB) - may need alternative font hosting or fallback

action_items: Consider adding data-testid attributes to interactive elements for better test automation
Consider using a fallback font or self-hosting Cabinet Grotesk font if font loading issues persist in production
context_for_next_testing_agent: Frontend-only React portfolio website. All pages working correctly. Navigation tested across Home, Portfolio, About, Contact, and Case Study pages. All images loading. Contact form fields functional. External PowerPoint embeds via Microsoft Office Online iframes working but produce some external resource errors (expected).

Skills section with Design column (Wireframing, Prototyping, Visual Design)
